Title: Painted Skin
Director: Gordon Chan, Andy Wing-Keung Chin(co-director), Danny Ko(co-director)
Writer: Ho-Leung Lau (screenplay), Abe Kwong (screenplay), Gordon Chan (screenplay), Songling Pu (novel)
Actors: Donnie Yen, Xun Zhou, Kun Chen, Wei Zhao
Plot: Where there is trouble, there is solution. This time, the troubles comes from two myth spirits that take the form of a human. Disguise in human skin and clothes, the two continues to take the heart of human to stay alive and young. But one of them leads to the wrong path and fall in love with a married man. What will happen to the live of this man and his wife after saving the her from the barbarians?
